summary: Project to add a new page that embeds the full Quench Joy Flow water tracker site.
architectural_notes: Embed the full external site on a new page (likely via iframe-style embed).

existing_features.title: Create a new frontend page titled "Gold Water Tracker" that embeds the full site https://quench-joy-flow.lovable.app/ in an iframe, with responsive sizing that works on mobile and desktop.
Add a new route for the "Gold Water Tracker" page at a stable path (e.g., "/gold-water-tracker") in the TanStack Router configuration so it can be navigated to directly by URL.
Expose navigation to the new "Gold Water Tracker" page from the app navigation (desktop header nav and mobile menu) using English user-facing text.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a new page ("Gold Water Tracker") that embeds the full site https://quench-joy-flow.lovable.app/ (site embed)
